Welcome to Lee Chee Tian's ISSS624 website.

Here are Chee Tian's work for the ISSS624 Geospatial Analytics module:

1.  Hands-on Exercises

    iv) [Hands-on Exercise 3](Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex3/hands-on_ex3.qmd) :- [**Geographical Segmentation with Spatially Constrained Clustering Techniques**](Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex3/hands-on_ex3.qmd)
